backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor defining a placeholder backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented website features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of all frontend components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining Royal Cafe theme variables, dark mode tokens, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading metadata and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all Royal Cafe sections with navigation and footer.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/data/c: Centralized content definitions for highlights, menu categories, gallery images, and testimonials.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/Footer: Footer with cafe info, quick links, social icons, and attribution bar.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/NavBar: Responsive navigation bar with scroll detection, smooth section scrolling, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/sectio: About section showing cafe intro text and a feature grid highlighting key qualities.
Renders the contact section with address, hours, phone, email, and a Google Maps link using data from contactInfo.
Displays a grid of gallery images with hover captions and opens selected images in a modal dialog.
Provides the landing hero section with background image, branding, tagline, location, and scroll-to-section buttons.
Shows a grid of highlighted popular items with descriptions, optional badges, and prices.
Renders categorized menu items with names, descriptions, and prices, using menuCategories data.
Displays customer testimonials in a grid with star ratings, quotes, and author details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, color variables, dark mode palettes, typography, and custom Tailwind utility classes for the Royal Cafe theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radii, animations, and plugin integrations aligned with the Royal Cafe design tokens.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, images, and feature definitions for building the Royal Cafe website.
